price: Adasamma, monsuro mo Wura Nyankopͻn; nokorε sε Awosoͻ (Da) no yε dͻnhwere bi a εho asεm so papaapa.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ إِنَّ زَلۡزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَيۡءٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu ittaqū rabbakum inna zalzalata al-sāʿati shayon ʿaẓīmun
